Title: Mori Calliope
GameText: POWER - Apprentice Reaper: Mori Calliope deals 1 target 1 melee damage. You may activate 1 REAP.

- 1 Hero takes their POWER PHASE.
- Destroy 1 Ongoing card.
- 1 Hero target deals 1 target 2 infernal damage.

Title: Mori Calliope
GameText: Power - Casual Rapper: Either discover 1 Ongoing card or activate 1 RAP. If a card was not played this way, Mori Calliope regains 3 HP.

Title: Calli's Mic
GameText:
POWER: Activate 1    RAP.
START PHASE
You may discard 1 card. If you discard a card this way, draw 1 card or play 1 Flow card.
Quote: Calliope Mori on this goddamn mic                    I don't want your fxxkin' money          I just want your life!

Title: Cheap Wine
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play 1 card.
After Mori Calliope is dealt damage, she may regain 2 HP. If she regains HP this way, use 1 power and destroy this card.
POWER: Draw 1 card. Activate 1    RAP.
Quote: By your side with my scythe and red wine.

Title: Could you please RIP?
GameText:
RAP
Play up to 2 Flow cards.
   REAP
Mori Calliope deals 1 target 4 infernal damage. Destroy this card.
Quote: I'm not asking for much                                 Do me a favor and die?               Gomen, shitsurei shimasu ga shinde kudasai~
Attribution: -- Calliope Mori, 失礼しますが、RIP♡

Title: Death Scythe
GameText:
Damage dealt by Mori Calliope is irreducible.
POWER: Mori Calliope deals 1 target 2 melee and 1 infernal damage. Either activate 1    REAP or draw 1 card.
Quote: My scythe is very hard, very rigid and very long.

Title: Death Sensei's Teachings
GameText:
After a Flow card is destroyed, you may activate 1    REAP.
DRAW PHASE
You may draw an additional card this phase.
Quote: "Everyone dies in the end, Mori. We are the end. We do not make friends with the ones we bring across the river."

Title: end of a life
GameText:
RAP
Salvage 2 Flow cards.
   REAP
Destroy 1 target with 5 or fewer HP. Destroy this card.
Quote: Disappearing into the mist of 'never happened'        Is the me that I can never befriend          I let it go
Attribution: -- calliope mori, end of a life

Title: Guh!
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Discover 1 Flow card.
You may play 1 card or activate 1    RAP.
Quote: G to the U.H., saying give up haters!

Title: Murder is Kawaii
GameText:
Draw 1 card or discover 1 Flow card.
Activate up to 2    REAP. 
Mori Calliope regains 4 HP.
Quote: Kurosu no koto ga tanoshi!           Murder is so fxxking kawaii!
Attribution: -- Calliope Mori, 失礼しますが、RIP♡

Title: Reaper Rapper
GameText:
RAP
Activate another card's    REAP.
   REAP
Activate another card's    RAP. Destroy this card.
Quote: Reaper or Rapper? Either is fine.

Title: Red
GameText:
RAP
Discover 1 Flow card.
   REAP
Mori Calliope deals each non-Hero target 2 infernal damage. Destroy this card.
Quote:
I'd rather kick it in the dungeon            
              'cause I'm that kind of beast                        
I'll bet my heart on the cards       
    because I trust me the least

Title: Scuffed Up Age
GameText:
RAP
Until your START PHASE, -1 damage dealt to Mori Calliope. Draw 1 card.
   REAP
Destroy up to 2 Ongoing cards. Destroy this card.
Quote:
Must be something surreal
An endless dream we can't heal
This rusted world wound up real
Still wanna love the way it feels

Title: Self Depreciating Rap
GameText:
Play or discover 1 Flow card.
Mori Calliope may deal herself 1 fixed psychic damage. If she does, play 1 Flow card. 
Mori Calliope may deal herself 1 fixed psychic damage. If she does, activate 1    RAP.
Quote: I'm filling syllables with curse words                   because I am an amateur              Everybody likes... self depreciating... rap.

Title: Streaming Reaper
GameText:
After you play a Flow card for the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
After Mori Calliope destroys a target, she regains 2 HP.
Quote:
Transmission live before you!                                  I’ll reap in real-time                                   
Just don’t forget admission,             
That soul is still mine
Attribution: -- calliope mori, grim reaper is a live-streamer

Title: Unalive
GameText:
RAP
Discard 1 card. Summon 1 Limited card.
   REAP
Mori Calliope regains 4 HP. Destroy this card.
Quote:
My home,                                  a place I'll never know until I'm satisfied                           
To move forward,                             the lore is I must be void inside

Title: Workaholic Business Lady
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
You may activate 1    RAP.
Mori Calliope may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card.
Quote:
Go ahead and BE sore, but I won't run       
Cause I'm a workaholic business lady, getting shxt done
Attribution: -- Calliope Mori, 失礼しますが、RIP♡
